description: Learn how to make an easy weeknight dinner in only 30 minutes with this delicious pasta recipe, packed with golden eggplant, cheese and a hint of chilli.
keywords: Pasta,Eggplant,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Sicilian Pasta Alla Norma Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g La Molisana Pastificio Extra Di Lusso Paccarielli Rigati No 321

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large, deep frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Fry half the eggplant, stirring occasionally, for 4 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a plate. Repeat with remaining oil and eggplant.

Add garlic and chilli to pan and cook for 1 minute or until garlic is fragrant. Add tomatoes, reduce heat to low and simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes, adding eggplant halfway through cooking, or until sauce has slightly thickened. Season.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling salted water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.
Add pasta, parmesan and reserved cooking liquid to pan. Toss until well combined. Serve topped with ricotta, basil and extra parmesan.
